report.name: eRefLigPrjAd

dataSource.name: Q_REQ_PRINC
dataSource.select: SELECT ---- Données du DOSSIER PROJET dp.dpcode DP_DPCODE, dp.dplib DP_DPLIB, dp.datimmo DP_DATIMMO, tdp.libtypdp DP_LIBTYPDP, ---- Données du SOUS PROJET pi.icpi ICPI, pi.ilibel ILIBEL, TO_CHAR(pi.datcre,'DD/MM/YYYY') DATCRE, pi.icpir ICPIR, pi2.ilibel ILIBEL_G, TO_CHAR(pi.cada) CADA, ca.clibrca CA_CLIBRCA, TO_CHAR(pi.datprod,'MM/YYYY') DATPROD, TO_CHAR(pi.datrpro,'MM/YYYY') DATRPRO, pi.statut STATUT, cs.libstatut LIBSTATUT, DECODE(pi.STATUT,'O',1,'N',2,'D',3,'Q',4,'A',5,'R',6,'C',7,0) TRI_STATUT, TO_CHAR(pi.datdem,'MM/YYYY') DATDEM, TO_CHAR(pi.datstatut,'DD/MM/YYYY') DATSTATUT, pi.librpb LIBRPB, pi.idrpb IDRPB, cm.clilib CLILIB, pi.imop IMOP, si.libdsg LIBDSG, pi.icme ICME, db.libelle DB_LIB_DB, ea.libelle EA_LIB_EA, lb.pid LB_PID, lb.pnom LB_PNOM, lb.typproj LB_TYPPROJ, lb.codcamo LB_CODCAMO, ca2.clibrca LB_LIB_CODCAMO, lb.metier LB_METIER, DECODE(lb.METIER,'ME ',0,'MO ',1,'HOM',3,4) TRI_METIER, lb.codsg LB_CODSG, si2.libdsg LB_LIBDSG, pi.CODCAMO1 LB_CODCAMOCA1, pi.CLIBCA1 LB_CLIBCA1, pi.CODCAMO2 LB_CODCAMOCA2, pi.CLIBCA2 LB_CLIBCA2, pi.CODCAMO3 LB_CODCAMOCA3, pi.CLIBCA3 LB_CLIBCA3, pi.CODCAMO4 LB_CODCAMOCA4, pi.CLIBCA4 LB_CLIBCA4, pi.CODCAMO5 LB_CODCAMOCA5, pi.CLIBCA5 LB_CLIBCA5, pi.DUREEAMOR DUREEAMOR, -- bud.bnmont BUD_NOTIFIE, -- bud.anmont BUD_ARB_NOTIFIE, -- bud.reestime BUD_REESTIME, -- bud.bpmontmo BUD_PROP_MO, -- bud.bpmontme BUD_PROP_ME, -- con.cusag CON_CUSAG, -- con.xcusag CON_XCUSAG rpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(NVL(bud.bnmont ,0), 'FM999999999999'), '0'), 12, ' ') BUD_NOTIFIE, rpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(NVL(bud.anmont ,0), 'FM999999999999'), '0'), 12, ' ') BUD_ARB_NOTIFIE, rpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(NVL(bud.reestime ,0), 'FM999999999999'), '0'), 12, ' ') BUD_REESTIME, rpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(NVL(bud.bpmontmo ,0), 'FM999999999999'), '0'), 12, ' ') BUD_PROP_MO, rpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(NVL(bud.bpmontme ,0), 'FM999999999999'), '0'), 12, ' ') BUD_PROP_ME, rpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(NVL(con.cusag ,0), 'FM999999999999'), '0'), 12, ' ') CON_CUSAG, rpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(NVL(con.xcusag ,0), 'FM999999999999'), '0'), 12, ' ') CON_XCUSAG FROM proj_info pi, dossier_projet dp, centre_activite ca, centre_activite ca2, -- ensemble_applicatif ea, -- domaine_bancaire db, domaine db, sous_systeme ea, client_mo cm, struct_info si, struct_info si2, proj_info pi2, code_statut cs, type_dossier_projet tdp, ligne_bip lb, budget bud, consomme con WHERE dp.dpcode = pi.icodproj (+) and dp.typdp = tdp.typdp (+) and pi.cada = ca.codcamo (+) and pi.cod_db = db.code_d (+) and db.code_ss= ea.code_ss (+) and pi.icpir = pi2.icpi (+) and pi.codsg = si.codsg (+) and pi.clicode = cm.clicode (+) and pi.statut = cs.astatut (+) and pi.icpi = lb.icpi (+) and lb.codsg = si2.codsg (+) and lb.pid = bud.pid (+) and lb.pid = con.pid (+) and lb.codcamo = ca2.codcamo (+) &P_WHERE ORDER BY tri_statut asc, pi.icpi asc, tri_metier asc, si2.libdsg asc, lb.pid asc

textSegment.string: Référentiel au choix - DP classé par sous projets

function.name: afterpform
cf_dertrait
cf_annee
